page.title: 11Bramhope: Technology+Science
page.content: {A SURVEY OF 100 LOCAL HOUSEHOLDS {HOME HEATING:}Gas was the most popular fuel in homes with 77,solid fuel,10 and storage heater 15.{ {HOME ENTERTAINMENT:}The survey showed a large ammount of modern electronic equipment-157CTV,79 B/W TV,331 transistor radios,214 cassette players,73 music centres,64 Hi-Fi systems.There were 51 videos and 30 electronic organs or synthesizers. {KITCHEN EQUIPMENT:}There were 53 gas cookers,35 microwaves,110 fridges,74 deep freezers,101 washing machines,68 tumble dryers,68 coffee makers,51 food processers and 31 dish washers. {BATHROOM EQUIPMENT:}In the bathroom there were 0 jacuzzis,80 showers and 24 sunbeds. {HEAT INSULATION:}There were 56 houses with double glazing,52 with cavity wall insulation and 21 burglar alarms.
